sentence.Network_en: What Jock had done was beyond my comprehension.
sentence.Network_cn: 我无法理解乔克的所作所为。

encyclopedia.content: jock ，中文意译为“乔克”锛埬凶用級！jock，表示魁梧帅气的男生。 也常用以下用语： 1.[美国俚语]锛堄戎复笱級运动员(= jockstrap) 2.迷，爱好者 3.[俚语]苏格兰高原士兵 4.职业赛马骑师

entry.def: A jock is a young man who is enthusiastic about a particular sport and spends a lot of time playing it.

example.tran: 全美橄榄球大赛的年轻球迷

entry.def: A jock is the same as a disc jockey .

example.tran: 广播1台顶级流行音乐主持人西蒙·贝茨

means.word_mean: 1. a person trained to compete in sports
2. a support for the genitals worn by men engaging in strenuous exercise
